question: According to the World Malaria Report,2020 released by World Health Organization which country recorded the largest reduction in malaria cases in South East Asia?
explanation: The World Malaria Report,2020 was recently released by the World Health Organization. As per the report, India recorded the largest reduction in malaria cases in South East Asia. The case count has reduced from 20 million in 2000 to around 5.6 million in 2019. According to the report, India was one among the 11 highest Malaria burden countries in the world.
